坐.definition: to sit; to take a seat; to take (a bus, airplane etc); to bear fruit; variant of 座[zuo4]

坐不垂堂.definition: lit. don't sit under the eaves (where tiles may fall from the roof) (idiom); fig. keep out of danger

坐井觀天.definition: lit. to view the sky from the bottom of a well (idiom); ignorant and narrow-minded

坐享.definition: to enjoy (the benefit of sth) without lifting a finger; to sit back and enjoy (favorable circumstances)

坐享其成.definition: to reap where one has not sown (idiom)

坐以待斃.definition: to sit and wait for death (idiom); resigned to one's fate

坐像.definition: seated image (of a Buddha or saint)

坐冷板凳.definition: to hold an inconsequential job; to receive a cold reception; to be kept waiting for an assignment or audience; to be out in the cold; to be sidelined; to warm the bench; to cool one's heels

坐力.definition: see 後坐力|后坐力[hou4 zuo4 li4]

坐化.definition: to die in a seated posture (Buddhism)

坐吃享福.definition: vegetative existence; to consume passively without doing anything useful

坐吃山空.definition: lit. just sitting and eating, one can deplete even a mountain of wealth (idiom); fig. to spend one's money without generating any income

坐失.definition: to let sth slip by; to miss an opportunity

坐失機宜.definition: to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance

坐失良機.definition: to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance

坐好.definition: to sit properly; to sit up straight

坐實.definition: to serve as evidence for (an accusation etc); to reinforce (a perception); to bear out; to substantiate

坐山觀虎鬥.definition: lit. sit on the mountain and watch the tigers fight (idiom); fig. watch in safety whilst others fight then reap the rewards when both sides are exhausted

坐席.definition: seat (at a banquet); to attend a banquet

坐廁.definition: sitting toilet (contrasted with 蹲廁|蹲厕[dun1ce4] squat toilet)

坐月子.definition: to convalesce for a month following childbirth, following a special diet, and observing various taboos to protect the body from exposure to the "wind"

坐班.definition: to work office hours; on duty

坐禪.definition: to sit in meditation; to meditate

坐立不安.definition: lit. agitated sitting or standing (idiom); restless; fidgety

坐立難安.definition: unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)

坐等.definition: to sit and wait; (fig.) to be passive; to sit back and wait for (success, an opportunity etc)

坐而論道.definition: to sit and pontificate; to find answers through theory and not through practice (idiom)

坐臺.definition: to work as a hostess in a bar or KTV

坐落.definition: to be situated; to be located (of a building)

坐蠟.definition: to be embarrassed; to be put in a difficult situation

坐視.definition: to stand by and watch; to look on passively

坐視不理.definition: to sit and watch, but remain indifferent (idiom)

坐視無睹.definition: to turn a blind eye to

坐觀成敗.definition: to sit and await success or failure (idiom); to wait to see the outcome of a fight before taking sides; to sit on the fence

坐車.definition: to take the car, bus, train etc

坐鎮.definition: (of a commanding officer) to keep watch; to oversee

坐駕.definition: variant of 座駕|座驾[zuo4 jia4]

坐龍庭.definition: to be the reigning emperor; to ascend to the imperial throne
